item.title: easy git for beginners
item.description: I recently started using git, github (the online UI counterpart) and bitbucket (at work, similar to github). It’s a powerful tool to organize your work and makes it fairly easy (if opening up the cmd prompt/terminal is your thing) to collaborate with others on coding projects. For true beginners download the free Pro Git book and read chapters 1 - 3. It will cover setup, what git is, and almost everything I’m about to say.
